data.text: @Julieellen1 @PeppScotland Will do! See you on the other side ❤️ xx
@BrazierVictoria @PeppScotland I genuinely can’t believe it’s been two years! Really hope you’re doing well xx
@mornayoung @PeppScotland Oh my gosh. We talked about this in Ludlow… and then the world imploded… Have an amazing time
@mornayoung @PeppScotland Hope you both have the best time!
…it’s amazing / mad to be back in this very different world. Rehearsals start next week so fingers crossed all goes to plan this time! ❤️ 2/2
